string.value: Looks like Chief Stan has decided he wants to ask you a favor. Talk to #bChief Stan#k.

Chief Stan says that some strange commotion has occured in Golem's Temple, the most dangerous area near #m100000000#, and asks you to investigate. He says to not go in too deep, just up to the #b#m106010102##k, and report back.

Stan says he heard that monsters throughout different towns have been acting strange. He says that while the Mushrooms or #o1210100#s acting acting a little odd isn't a big deal, it will be a problem if the Golems start turning violent.
I'd look for another adventurer, if I could, but I have no choice... You must promise me that you will run away if you find yourself in danger. Don't be foolish. Do you understand?

Okay then. #m100000000# is a peaceful town, but there is a dangerous area nearby known as the Golem's Temple. So far, it hasn't been a problem since the Golems are so slow and they don't leave their area.
But I've been hearing strange noises coming from the Golem's Temple lately. Thumping and banging... They're up to something, and we must find out what. That's where you come in.
It might be dangerous, so don't go in too deep. Yes, go no further than #b#m106010102##k and see if you can find out anything. Don't get yourself into trouble now, you hear?
Don't overestimate your strength. Many adventurers hurt themselves being foolish like that. I won't let you go anywhere until you promise me that you'll put your safety before anything else.
Did you visit the Golem's Temple? Was there anything out of the ordinary? Tell me.\r\n#b#L0#There was a door with a strange puppet sitting on top. #l\n#k
A door with a strange puppet sitting on top... What could it be? Is someone playing a joke on us?

Monsters in various towns have started acting strange. It would be awful if those Golems became more violent than they already are. We can stop Mushrooms or #o1210100#s, but not Golems.. I'll ask for your help if something happens.
You haven't entered the Golem's Temple yet? Go in until you reach #b#m106010102##k and report anything you find strange in the Temple.
